Package io.permazen.parse.expr

Class AbstractValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.permazen.parse.expr.AbstractValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Value
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLValue, BeanPropertyValue, ConstValue, FieldValue, InstanceFieldValue, JFieldValue, StaticFieldValue
    public abstract class AbstractValue
extends Object
implements Value
    Value implementation superclass with implementations for all methods other than get().

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public Class<?> getType​(ParseSession session)
        Description copied from interface: Value
        Get the type of this value without evaluating it.

        This should perform a best-effort attempt to determine the type, but should not invoke get(). If the type is unknown, Object.class should be returned.

        Specified by:
        getType in interface Value
        Parameters:
        session - parse session
        Returns:
        the expected type of the evaluated result

      • xxcrement

        public Value xxcrement​(ParseSession session,
                       String operation,
                       boolean increment)
        Description copied from interface: Value
        Increment/decrement this value. Also supports BigInteger and BigDecimal. This value must be an LValue.
        Specified by:
        xxcrement in interface Value
        Parameters:
        session - current session
        operation - description of operation for error messages
        increment - true to increment, false to decrement
        Returns:
        the adjusted value (which will not be an LValue)

      • compare

        public Value compare​(ParseSession session,
                     Value that,
                     int mask)
        Description copied from interface: Value
        Ordered comparison to another value. Supports numeric and Comparable comparison.
        Specified by:
        compare in interface Value
        Parameters:
        session - current session
        that - value to compare to
        mask - bit mask with bits Value.LT, Value.GT, and/or Value.EQ
        Returns:
        boolean value which will be true if the comparison is true
